// NOTES:
// Aliases don't have spaces in them!
// The indentations are with tabs!

// Game
// Game: (Red|Blue|Yellow)
Game: Red

// Images // TODO
// Image: <alias> <image path>

// Aliases // TODO
// TrainerAlias: <alias> <trainerID> // alias is how you name him, trainerID is how the application knows him as

// Custom trainers
// Trainer: <name> [:: <location>] :: <alias> <name>:<level> [..] // ID will be generated by the application (?)
Trainer: Rival 1 :: Pallet Town :: rival1 bulbasaur:5
Trainer: Bug Catcher 1 :: Viridian Forest :: bug1 weedle:9
Trainer: Brock :: Pewter City :: brock geodude:12 onix:14

Trainer: Bug Catcher 2 :: Route 3 :: bug2 caterpie:10 weedle:10 caterpie:10

Trainer: Super Nerd 1 :: Mt. Moon 1F :: nerd1 magnemite:11 voltorb:11
Trainer: Lass Moon :: Mt. Moon 1F :: lassmoon oddish:11 bellsprout:11
Trainer: Hiker Moon :: Mt. Moon 1F :: hikermoon geodude:10 geodude:10 onix:10
Trainer: Rocket Moon :: Mt. Moon B2F :: rocketmoon rattata:13 zubat:13
Trainer: Super Nerd 2 :: Mt. Moon B2F :: nerd2 grimer:12 voltorb:12 koffing:12

Trainer: Rival 2 :: Cerulean City :: rival2 pidgeotto:18 abra:15 rattata:15 bulbasaur:17

Trainer: Lass 1 :: Route 24 :: lass1 pidgey:14 nidoranf:14

Trainer: Hiker 1 :: Route 25 :: hiker1 onix:17

Trainer: Youngster 2 :: SS Anne :: youngster2 nidoranm:21

Trainer: Surge :: Vermilion City :: surge voltorb:21 pikachu:18 raichu:24
// Route 9

// Pokemon Tower

// Moves replaced when leveling (if needed) // TODO
// MoveReplace: <pokemon> :: <old move> <new move>
MoveReplace: Wartortle :: Bubble Bite


// Route
Route: Red Any% Glitchless - Squirtorino basic (Snorms)
	S: Before starting
		Clear any existing save file by pressing Up + B + Select on the game title screen
		Set text speed to FAST, battle animation to OFF and battle style to SET
		Give your character and your rival a one-character name
	S: Pallet Town
		Optional: withdraw the PC Potion in your room
		GetP: #squirtle:5
			Choose Squirtle, and give it a one-character name
		B: rival1
			Tail Whip once (or twice if Growl turn 1), then spam Tackle
	S: Route 1
		E: Route 1 :: 1:0 3:1 4:0 5:0
			Kill an encounter for experience to get Bubble for Brock
		Do parcel stuff
		When delivering the Parcel, walk behind or next to Prof. Oak so that your (slow walking) rival takes fewer steps in the cut scene
	S: Viridian City
		GetI: Potion
			Return to Viridian City and go north, picking up the tree potion, and entering Viridian Forest
	S: Viridian Forest
		Avoid encounters as much as possible by walking on encounterless grass tiles
		GetI: Antidote
			Pick up the antidote hidden in the big tree
		GetI: Antidote
			Pick up the antidote on the way up
		GetI: Potion
			Be at least 10 HP before the Weedle Guy, and pick up the hidden Potion next to him
		B: bug1
			Weedle Guy :: Tail Whip x2, spam tackle. If you get poisoned, wait until after the fight to use the Antidote. If you fall below 7 HP, use a Potion
		Swap: 0 1
			After the fight, swap Nidoran to the front, heal Squirtle to 17+ HP and heal poison if necessary
	S: Pewter City
		B: brock
			Bubble all
		Shop: Pewter Mart (in order)
			-1 TM34
			4 Poke_Ball
			4 Antidote
			11 Potion
			1 Escape_Rope
			1 Awakening
			2 Parlyz_Heal
	S: Route 3
		If possible, try to get redbar at the end of this route for Mt. Moon
		B: bug2
			BB all or TW + Tackle on the Caterpie's if higher attack
		Heal if under 25 HP
		B: jrtrmshorts
			BB x4, TW + Tackle x3
		B: bug3
			BB all or TW + Tackle on Weedle and Caterpie if high atk and low spc
		B: bug4
			TW + Tackle x2 or BB x4, WG
		C: Route 3 :: #1
			Catch a Spearow or a Pidgey in the grass patch. Use Poison Sting to weaken Lv. 5 Spearows, HA for Lv. 8 Pidgeys and Tackle for everything else
		Don't take the center
	S: Mt. Moon
//		B: nerd1
//		B: lassmoon
		GetI: TM_01
//		E: Mt. Moon 1F :: 3:1 6:0
//			Kill 1 encounter, preferably Geodude
		B: hikermoon
			BB or WG all
		C: Mt. Moon B2F :: #6
			Catch a paras
		Menu: Teach TM01 and potion if < 28 HP
			TM: Mega_Punch :: 0 :: Tackle
		B: rocketmoon
			WG x2, MP + WG or WG x2
		B: nerd2
			MP x2, MP + WG, MP x2 or WG x 3
	S: Cerulean City
		Heal at center and go to the gym
		S: Cerulean City Gym
			B: jrtrfmisty
				TW + MP x2
			Heal to full
			B: misty
				TW + MP x2, TW for -2 def + MP x3
		GetI: Rare_Candy
		Menu: If you're low on health heal with 1 potion
			TM: Bubblebeam :: 0 :: Tail_Whip
		Get Ready for redbar manip, you can miss 1 Bubblebeam on all of rival, nugget bridge and route 25
		B: rival2
			BB x2, MP, BB, MP x2
	S: Nugget Bridge
		B: bug5
			BB all
		B: lass1
			BB all, Bubble Nidoran first if you still need redbar
		Heal poison if you have it, unless you can easily manipulate redbar off of it
		B: youngster1
			BB all
		B: lass2
			BB, BB + Bubble
		B: jrtrm1
			BB + Bubble
		B: rocket1
			BB all
	S: Route 25
		B: hiker1
			Bubble
		B: lass3
			BB all
		B: jrtrm2
			BB all
		B: lass4
			MP, BB, MP
		Save Bill, escape rope out and heal at center
	S: Underground & Route 6
		B: rocketdig
			Bite + BB, Bite x2 or Bite + MP
		GetI: Full_Restore
		B: jrtrf1
			BB all
		B: jrtrm3
			BB all or MP, Bite x2
	S: Vermilion City
		S: SS Anne
			Menu: Heal if necessary
				TM: Dig :: 0 :: Water_Gun
			B: rival3
				Bite + BB (or BB + Bite), BB, MP or Dig, MP x2 or Bite + Dig
		Shop: Vermilion Mart
			6 Super_Potion
			3 Repel
		S: Vermilion Gym
			Menu: On the tile before the Cut bush, teach BB over tackle if you haven't yet
				SWAP: Repel :: 0
				TM: Cut :: 2 // TODO: fix "TM: HM_01 :: 2"
			B: surge
				Dig, MP or Dig, Dig (Raichu pls no)
			GetI: Bike_Voucher
				After the fight, pick up the Bike Voucher from the chairman of the fan club, theb Dig back to Cerulean
	S: Cerulean City
		GetI: Bicycle :: Bike_Voucher
			Get the Bicycle from the bike shop
		Menu: After leaving the shop (TODO), use super potion if low hp
			SWAP: Bicycle :: 1
		Get on the bike and head east to Route of Shitness, cutting the two bushes in your way
	S: Route 9
		B: jrtrf2
			Grass Bitch #1 :: Bite x2 or Dig, MP or Dig, Bite x2 or Dig, MP or Dig
		B: bug6
			BB, BB or MP, Bite x2
		Menu: Use a Repel a few steps before entering Rock Tunnel
			USE: Repel
	S: Rock Tunnel
		I: http://wiki.pokemonspeedruns.com/index.php/Pok%C3%A9mon_Red/Blue/Rock_Tunnel
			Map to get through Rock Tunnel
		B: maniac1
			BB, Bite x2 + MP or Bite + MP x2
		B: maniac2
			Bite x3 + MP
		Heal with a Super Potion if necessary
		B: jrtrf3
			Bite + MP or Bite x2, Bite x2
		Menu: Use your second Repel a bit after the last fight
			USE: Repel
		Menu: Use your third Repel before fighting the Hiker
			USE: Repel
		B: hiker2
			BB all
		B: jrtrf4
			BB, Dig, BB
	S: Route 8
		B: gambler1
			BB all
		Take the underground path to Celadon City
		GetI: Elixer
			Pick up the hidden Elixer in the underground
		GetI: Nugget
			Pick up the hidden Nugget in the underground
	S: Celadon City
		Take the center before shopping
		Shop: 2F
			-2 Nugget
			-1 TM_24
//			-x Healing items
			1 TM_07
			10 Super_Repel
		Shop: 4F
			1 Poke_Doll
		Shop: 6F
			1 Fresh_Water
		GetI: TM_13 :: Fresh_Water
			Get Ice Beam from the girl
		Shop: Before going down again
			1 Fresh_Water
		Shop: 5F
			10 X_Accuracy
			2 X_Attack
			6 X_Speed
			6 X_Special
		Take the elevator down to 1F and leave
		GetI: HM_02
			Bike west, cut the bush, go through the building and get Fly from the girl in the house
		Menu: Upon exiting the house
			SWAP: Super_Repel :: 1
			USE: Super_Repel
			TM: Fly :: 2
		Fly to Lavender and walk to the Pokemon Tower
	S: Pokemon Tower
		Menu: In the rival fight
			SWAP: X_Accuracy :: 2
		B: rival4
			Swap xacc's + xatk x2 + (xacc if SA) + MP, Bite x2, BB or Dig, Bite, Dig
		B: channeler1
			Dig all
//		GetI: Elixer // ??
//			Get the Elixer item ball immediately after the Channeler
//		GetI: Elixer // ??
//			Get the hidden Elixer on 5F
		Take the free heal on 5F
		B: channeler2
			Dig all
		B: channeler3
			Dig all
		GetI: Rare_Candy
			Get the Rare Candy that blocks the way, then enter the Ghost battle and escape using the Poke Doll
		Menu: Battle menu. Swap Elixers if you used the antidote
			SWAP: Elixer :: 3
			USE: Poke_Doll
		Menu: In the Rocket fight
			SWAP: X_Speed :: 4
		B: rocket2
			Swap xspd's + xspc + BB, BB, BB x2
		B: rocket3
			Dig, Bite x2
		B: rocket4
			BB all
		GetI: Poke_Flute
			Talk to Mr. Fuji to warp to his house and get the Poke Flute, then walk out and Fly to Celadon City (1 down)
	S: Celadon City
		Menu: Upon exiting, use a Super Repel and bike west to the Snorlax and Cycling Road
			USE: Super_Repel
			USE: Bicycle
		Menu: On the tile before the Snorlax
			SWAP: X_Special :: 5
			USE: Poke_Flute
		Run from the Snorlax
	S: Cycling road
		GetI: Rare_Candy
			Pick up the hidden Rare Candy?
		GetI: PP_UP
			Pick up PP UP?
		Bike to the Safari Zone, going around the bushes
	S: Safari Zone
		I: http://i.imgur.com/oBebL5z.jpg
			Map of the Safari Zone
		Manip: Safari Zone West :: 4 :: 15 9 14 14
			Use a manip of your choice to get a Lv. 33 Nidorino with (almost) perfect stats, and give it a one-character name
		Swap: 0 3
			Swap Nidorino to the first in your party
		Menu:
			USE: Super_Repel
			USE: Rare_Candy :: 1 :: 0
			USE: Moon_Stone :: 1 :: 0
			TM: Horn_Drill :: 0 :: Horn_Attack
			TM: Ice_Beam :: 0 :: Fury_Attack
//		GetI: Full_Restore
//			Get the Full Restore in the second area if you've already used your first one
		GetI: Protein
			if ??
		GetI: Gold_Teeth
			In the fourth area, get the Gold Teeth outside
		GetI: HM_03
			Get Surf from the guy in the house, then Dig back to Celadon
	S: Celadon City
		Bike east to Silph Co. in Saffron City, giving the Fresh Water to the guard in the house // TODO: Give item
	S: Silph Co.
		Take the elevator to 10F, then go left and down to fight the Rocket, avoiding the Scientist
		B: rocket5
			X Acc + HD
		GetI: Carbos
		GetI: Rare_Candy
		GetI: TM_26
		Take the stairs to 9F
		Menu: Once on 9F
			USE: PP_UP :: 1 :: 0 :: Horn_Drill
			USE: Carbos :: 1 :: 0
			TM: Earthquake :: 0 :: Poison_Sting
		Hug the east wall, then the south wall and take the teleporter to 5F
		B: rocket6
			Dig
		GetI: Card_Key
			Go right to pick up the Card Key
		Take the teleporter to 9F and back to 5F, then open the door to your left and take the teleporter to 3F
		Walk right, up, then open the door to your left, and take the teleporter to 7F
		Heal?
		B: rival5
			X_Accuracy + X_Speed + (X_Special x2 for silph red bar) + HD, HD, HD, HD
		Take the teleporter to 11F
		B: rocket7
			IB, EQ, IB (??)
		Menu:
			USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0
		B: giovannisilph
			X_Accuracy + EQ, HD, IB, HD
		Dig back to Celadon, then Fly to Fuchsia (2 down) and walk to the gym
	S: Fuchsia Gym
		Hug the right wall when going up
		B: juggler1
			EQ all (x4)
		Menu: Elixer, Candy and heal to 50+ HP to tank a confusion
			USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0
			USE: Rare_Candy :: 1 :: 0
		B: juggler2
			EQ, EQ + TB
		B: koga
			X_Accuracy + HD, HD, HD, TB x2 and Pokeflute until Selfdestruct
		GetI: HM_04
			Bike east to the warden's house to get Strength, then fly to Pallet Town
	S: Pallet Town
		Menu: Use Rare Candies to revive Nidoking
			USE: Super_Repel
			USE: Rare_Candy :: 3 :: 0
			TM: Surf :: 0 :: Focus_Energy
			USE: Protein :: 1 :: 0
			USE: Bicycle
		Bike to the water and Surf south to Cinnabar Mansion
	S: Cinnabar Mansion
		I: http://i.imgur.com/UktHB4j.jpg
			Take this path through the Cinnabar Mansion, flipping the switches and taking the candies on the way
		Menu: After falling down and taking the stairs
			USE: Super_Repel
			TM: Strength :: 3 :: Mega_Punch
		GetI: Rare_Candy
			Get the Rare Candy item ball in the room on the north
//		GetI: TM_22
//			If used all 3 Carbos
		GetI: Rare_Candy
			Get the hidden Rare Candy
		Menu: Candy to L45
//			TM: Strength :: 3 :: Mega_Punch
			USE: Rare_Candy :: 2 :: 0
		GetI: Secret_Key
			Get the Secret Key, then Dig out and fly to Cinnabar and bike to the gym
	S: Cinnabar Gym
		Answers: ABBBAB
		B: blaine
			xspc + Surf, Surf, EQ, EQ
		Menu: After Blaine, use an Elixer, Dig out and bike to Saffron Gym
			USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0
	S: Saffron Gym
		B: sabrina
			EQ, (xspd) + EQ, EQ, EQ
		Dig out on the teleporter and bike to the gym
	S: Celadon Gym
		Hug the left wall and Cut the bush in the top-left corner
		B: beauty1
			IB
		B: erika
			IB all (x3)
		Walk out, then Fly to Viridian (1 up)
	S: Viridian Gym
		B: cool1
			IB
		B: blackbelt1
			xacc + HD all
		Reload the positions of the trainers
		B: giovanni
			IB, IB, EQ, EQ, IB x2
		Menu: When outside of the gym
			USE: Super_Repel
			USE: Bicycle
		Bike west to Route 22 and Victory road
	S: Route 22
		B: rival6
			X_Accuracy + X_Speed + IB x2, IB or surf, HD, HD, EQ, HD
		Bike toward Victory Road
		GetI: Max_Ether
		Menu: After leaving the water
			USE: Super_Repel
			USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0
	S: Victory Road
		Use Strength upon entering and push the first boulder onto the switch on the right, then bike to the ladder in the top-left corner
		Use Strength again, push the boulder below onto the switch, bike up the steps hugging the north edge and use a Super Repel
		Menu:
			USE: Super_Repel
		Bike to the right, down the stairs, then right and up to the ladder
		Use strength again and push the boulder onto the switch to the left, then bike to the bottom-right corner and push the boulder down the hole and go down the hole
		Menu: Use Strength first, then your last Super Repel
			USE: Super_Repel
			USE: Bicycle
		Push the boulder onto the switch to the left, bike back to where you fell down and follow the ladders to the exit
	S: Elite Four
		Deposit all but Nidoking and flier
		Shop: Optional if you have 2 Full Restores
			5 Full_Restores
		B: lorelei
			Switch to flier and let it die, X_Accuracy + HD, HD, HD, EQ, HD
		Menu: Elixer before fighting Bruno
			USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0
		B: bruno
			X_Accuracy + IB, HD, HD, IB, HD
		Heal to full
		B: agatha
			X_Special (or X_Speed if you want to play safe) + EQ, IB, EQ, EQ, EQ, if you get put to sleep, use the Poke Flute immediately. If you get Hazed, you lose your X Accuracy, so IB 2x Golbat and EQ Arbok
		Menu: At least 2 steps before Lance, heal to ~130 HP to manipulate red bar from Gyarados and use your last PP item
			USE: Elixer :: 1 :: 0
		B: lance
//			X_Special + TB, X_Speed + IB, IB, IB, IB
			Yolodrill (why?), xspc + xspd + IB, (xspc) + IB, IB, IB
		Heal to 55+ HP and use your last PP item if you didn't already
		B: rival7
			xspd + xacc + HD all
//			X_Special + X_Accuracy + HD, HD, IB, HD, HD, HD, if Sky Attack turn 1, use a Full Restore
		D: END

===
